p: jail and him there safely keep until the explanation of said six months and until said fine is paid, or until he shall there be released by due cause of law Dated this 1st day of October 1878 Signed Samuel Greene Justice of the Peace Territory vs. Author Hain Committed upon Sentence Daniel W. Post is herby authorized to act as constable in this cause because of a vacaney in the offense of constable in White River Signed Samuel Greene Justice of the peace
